text: Johann Hermann Wolfgang Mulzer is a German organic chemist, best known for his work in total synthesis. Since 1996, he has been a professor of chemistry at the University of Vienna (Universität Wien). ==Awards== *1994 Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz Prize *1997 Ernst Schering Prize *2010 Emil Fischer Medal. ==Notes== ==References== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:German chemists Category:Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz Prize winners
title: Johann Mulzer
